statements: DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 123 AND behavior_score > 50;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' AND monthly_savings_amount < 500.00;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND behavior_score > 80;
DELETE FROM SavingsPlanSegments WHERE segment_id IN (SELECT segment_id FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score < 50);
DELETE FROM SavingsBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'loyalty' AND behavior_details LIKE '%rewards%';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE name = 'John Smith'
DELETE FROM CustomerSegmentation WHERE segment = 'High Net Worth';
